name: Wonder Flavours
description:
We began with three principles in mind; do something we love, let our creativity soar, and become the best. We brought it altogether with one idea: To bring flavour to life. Wonder Flavours was born.

Wonder Flavours delivers a variety of complex flavour concentrates for professional chefs and culinary enthusiasts. Flavours ranging from Cinnamon Pastry and Butter Pecan Pie to Sour Blue Raspberry Candy. We're passionate about creating savory, food grade flavours. Our team takes pride in providing quality products and excellent customer service.

Wonder Flavours is a Canadian company out of Montreal, Quebec.
